name: I want games
description:
A manifesto made for Manifesto Jam. 

Heavily inspired by this passage of Rise of the Videogame Zinesters: How Freaks, Normals, Amateurs, Artists, Dreamers, Drop-outs, Queers, Housewives, and People Like You Are Taking Back an Art Form by Anna Anthropy.

This is the SFX I used for clicking on links.
